Posted on March 2, 2019

New Single "Surrounded By Murderers"

I wanted to announce that my new single, “Surrounded by Murderers” is coming out tomorrow night. The idea for this track came to me at work a few months ago and I could not get it out of my head. It really combines a lot of my feelings at this point in my life.

Although better known for my detective skills, my true passion is writing death metal songs. This website is my blog I use to verbalize my musical journey. Any bugs or issues with the website are purposeful and meant as a challenge for you to use your detective skills.
